com.xmlmind.ditac.util

Class ConsoleHelper2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xmlmind.ditac.util.ConsoleHelper
      • com.xmlmind.ditac.util.ConsoleHelper2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Console

    public class ConsoleHelper2
extends ConsoleHelper
    Same as ConsoleHelper except that it appends a #element(element_pointer) fragment to the system ID of the elements referenced in the messages.
